column5: Over the years I have gotten various tatoos for different reasons and I kind of always knew I would get a Tatoo of some kind as a tribute to a band that I have always loved and tried to see whenever possible. The first time I witnessed them  put a crushing on the Kingswood Music Theater in 83 and the journey continues. After 6 1/2 hours in the fighting chair the result is a stellar piece of art in my opinion and a Fine tribute to IRON MAIDEN and their lovable Mascot Eddie.Its a full calf that wraps 180 the picture does it no justice my next project is to get them all to sign around and then get the signatures tatooed at Bayfest this year I have my fingers crossed.I have met them all at different times so we will see what happens  Enjoy Biteme  UP THE IRONS
Can't beat "Run to the Hills", although there are plenty of great tunes! Nice ink.

Man thats an awesome tattoo  I watched Iron Maiden in Minneapolis years and years ago. I've always been a fan, I grew up listening to them on vinyl, lol. I loved buying most their albums on vinyl when I got older. I always thought it was the coolest art work on their covers.  Run to the hills is not only a great song, it's one of my all time fav. videos. If you haven't seen it, look it up.  Nobody puts on a concert like Iron Maiden, they do amazing shows!!!
Awesome Peter!  I saw them on the Powerslave and Somewhere in Time tours back in the day!  Amazing shows
the burn is addicting...awesome tat...definatly worthy of a shot out for your artist
His name is alley and he owns and operates PARIS INK in Oakville
Cool Peter! I was considering getting a tat the read 667...  It's the neighbour of the beast! LOL HH
Awesome ink!  Huge Maiden fan here.  Own most of their discography and have seen them twice now.  Their live show cannot  be beat.
Just snatched these of the tatoo shop site he took them yesterday better then i can do with an i phone gives an idea of scale. Promise this will be it  Biteme
Great work! I'm still thinking up things to put on my first tat(s). Definitely want my kids name/b-days on one, something about fishing on another and my fav band "RUSH" on another.
